block_comment: This Verilog block establishes error mapping and tracking for data lanes. It iterates through 'DQ_ERROR_WIDTH' lanes and monitors each one for errors by mapping the status of specific byte positions in 'error_byte_r1' to 'dq_lane_error[i]' and accumulates the error data. Additionally, it cumulatively logs lane errors by logically ORing the previous error state ('cumlative_dq_lane_error_r[i]') with the current error state ('dq_lane_error_r1[i]'), storing the result in 'cumlative_dq_lane_error_c[i]'.
